question: When were the Sassi of Matera recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site?
asked_question_translated: Kada Materos Sassi buvo pripažintas UNESCO pasaulio paveldo objektu?
answer: Materos Sassi buvo pripažintas UNESCO pasaulio paveldo objektu 1993 metais.
answer_translated_eng: Matera Sassi was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1993.
